column4: I installed vnc4server, and when I'm trying to start it, it shows me: xauth : stdin:1: bad display name "......" in "add" command
at this point I would tell you to run it from the system menu, but that's not there in feisty.
GOT it! you need to run it from a graphical terminal. SSH won't work.
that command will only work from a graphical terminal. running it through SSH or other non-graphical won't work.
long story short, if you're installing VNC, you probably can't get to one.
one import point i should note is that if the remote machine doesn't have any graphical desktops running, vnc isn't going to work. period.
how far away is this remote server? because the easiest thing to do would be to go over to it and run commands locally.
if it's rent dedicated, then it's probably running the server version and doesn't have a graphical interface installed, let alone running VNC.
